KPI.description: Disk read await time is increasing!
KPI.description-zh: 磁盘读响应时间升高，性能发生劣化

KPI.description: Disk write await time is increasing!
KPI.description-zh: 磁盘写响应时间升高，性能发生劣化

Features.description: The disk I/O await time performance deteriorates due to read throughput rise (read kbytes/second).(Disk = {})
Features.description-zh: 磁盘读吞吐量异常升高，导致I/O等待时间性能劣化(Disk = {})

Features.description: The disk I/O await time performance deteriorates due to write throughput rise (write kbytes/second).(Disk = {})
Features.description-zh: 磁盘写吞吐量异常升高，导致I/O等待时间性能劣化(Disk = {})

Features.description: The disk I/O await time performance deteriorates due to read saturation rise.(Disk = {})
Features.description-zh: 磁盘读饱和度量异常升高，导致I/O等待时间性能劣化(Disk = {})

Features.description: The disk I/O await time performance deteriorates due to write saturation rise.(Disk = {})
Features.description-zh: 磁盘读写饱和度量异常升高，导致I/O等待时间性能劣化(Disk = {})
